content.description: Step up on to a shallow stepped ledge, follow it right to a wide corner and finish over a bulge.
content.location: On the left half of Maximum Impact Wall on the left side of a slight jog in the wall.

climbs.name: Welcome to the Jungle
climbs.fa: Adam Pierce, Jim "Frodo" Lybarger, Joel Adams

content.description: Climb a slightly left arching crack formed by the end of the front layer of rock.
content.location: In the center of the Maximum Impact Wall.

climbs.name: Slo Pimpin' Jr
climbs.fa: Adam Pierce, Joel Adams, Jim Lybarger

content.description: Climb the left of the "twin" right-most cracks on the wall, until it pinches off. Move a couple feet left and finish on the next crack.
content.location: The far right side of the Maximum Impact Wall.

climbs.name: Maximum Impact
climbs.fa: Adam Pierce, Jim "Frodo" Lybarger, Joel Adams

content.description: Climb thin cracks to a roof, pull the roof and finish on right angling cracks.
content.location: Near the left end of Maximum Impact Wall.

climbs.name: Max Resist
climbs.fa: Adam Pierce, Joel Adams, Jim "Frodo" Lybarger, Jon DeBoer

content.description: Start to the right of a low roof. Climb a small crack that bends right after e few feet, then back left through small shallow roofs.
content.location: On the left edge of the Maximum Impact Wall.

climbs.name: Black Sunshine
climbs.fa: Jim Lybarger, Adam Pierce, Joel Adams

content.description: A crack that goes 15' up, bends to the right, widens in the middle and then narrows towards the top.
content.location: On the right side of Maximum Impact, 15' left of Slo Pimpin' Jr.

content.description: The Maximum Impact Wall is a 60' tall cliff with a handful of fun cracks and seams just in front and to the left of the Second Waterfall. With the exception one bolt, all climbs lead on gear. A decent ledge on top offers plentiful gear but longer slings are needed to set up TRs. Scramble off left to descend. The name came from Joel's aggressive topiary techniques used on the thicket of cat claws bushes at the bottom.
